Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Central Park/31st
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 26th, Central Park and 31st, due to street blockage near Central Park/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via  Lawndale, 26th, Central Park and 31st, due to street blockage near Central Park/31st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Grand
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Grand due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Grand due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line subway trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Cermak and Fullerton due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line subway trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated lines between Cermak-Chinatown and Fullerton due to police activty.

Train service to Howard

After stopping at Cermak-Chinatown, Howard-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Armitage (accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Fullerton and make all normal stops to Howard.

Connections can be made between 95th/Dan Ryan-bound subway service and Howard-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at State/Lake (transfer to nearby elevated station, board on Brown Line side) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

Shuttle busses have been requested from State/Lake to Fullerton to provide connecting service through the affected area.

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

95th/Dan Ryan-bound service is not affected.
